import React from "react"; import NavbarComponent from "../components/Navbar"; import HeaderComponent from "../components/header"; import DetailComponent from "../components/detail"; import IconComponent from "../components/icon"; import AboutComponent from "../components/about"; import FooterComponent from "../components/footer"; import MenuItems from "../components/MenuItems"; const Menu = () => { let addBtn = document.getElementsByClassName("add-to-cart"); let itemName = document.getElementsByClassName("itemName"); let itemPrice = document.getElementsByClassName("itemPrice"); function addItem() { for(let i = 0; i < addBtn.length; i++) { let newRow = document.createElement let newOrderName = document.createElement("td"); let newOrderPrice = document.createElement("td"); let orderName = itemName[i] let orderPrice = itemPrice[i] addBtn[i].addEventListener("click", () => { newOrderName.textContent = orderName newOrderPrice.textContent = orderPrice }) } } return(
